src:
Anja Rupel čaka na povabilo
Gledali smo jo na televiziji, poslušamo jo na radiu, le v muzikalu še ni nastopila.
03 Nov 2019, 13:33 by A. K.



Anja je pri 53 letih še vedno prava mačka. FOTO: arhiv izvajalca



Prvi glas zasedbe Videosex in vsejugoslovanski seks simbol FOTO: facebook


Če vprašate katerega Beograjčana v najboljših letih, bo najbrž povedal, da je Anja Rupel huda mačka iz Videosexa, Makedoncem je najbolj zlezla pod kožo s sodelovanjem s Tošejem Proeskim, mi pa smo se ob trenutnem navduševanju nad vsem, kar diši po devetdesetih letih, spomnili tudi, da je bila takrat, še preden nas je kot solistka osvojila s hiti, kot so Odšla bom še to noč, Lep je dan, Odpri oči, Ljubi me in ne sprašuj in Ne pozabi me, obraz naše prve zasebne televizije, Kanala A. Pa smo jo pobarali, ali bi jo še zanimalo vodenje kakšne oddaje. »A veste, kaj me resnično mika? Čakam na kakšno dobro ponudbo za muzikal! Na televiziji sem bila, v filmu tudi, snemala sem televizijske drame, na radiu sem še vedno vsak dan, v muzikalu se pa še nisem preizkusila, in to bi bil lahko izziv, ki bi mi bil v veliko veselje,« pravi Anja. Glede na to, da je njena dobra prijateljica Alenka Godec navdušila v hitu Mamma Mia! in da je generacija Simone Vodopivec, je v bistvu presenečenje, da je še nihče ni povabil v muzikal. Sicer pa boste lahko z Anjo, ki zadnja leta nastopa redkeje, kot bi si želeli, konec oktobra zapeli in zaplesali v Stožicah, na največji 90/00s zabavi v tem delu Evrope, kamor prihaja še kup domačih in mednarodnih glasbenih zvezd tistega časa.
text:
Anja Rupel is waiting for an invitation
We watched it on TV, we listen to it on the radio, but it has never appeared in a musical.
03 Nov 2019, 12:33 by A.K.



Anja is still a real cat at 53. PHOTO: Artist Archive



Videosex first voice and all-sex sex symbol PHOTO: facebook


If you ask a Belgrader in his best years, he will probably say that Anja Rupel is a serious cat from Videosex, she has most crawled under the skin of Macedonians in collaboration with Tose Proeski, and we were reminded of the current enthusiasm for everything that smells after the 1990s. also that she was, even before she won us hits as a soloist, such as I'll leave tonight, It's a beautiful day, Open your eyes, Love me and don't ask and Don't forget me, the face of our first private television, Channel A But we painted her whether she would be interested in running a show. “Do you know what really bothers me? I am waiting for some good deals on musicals! I was on TV, I was on TV, I was making TV dramas, I was still on the radio every day, and I hadn't tried it in a musical, and that could be a challenge that would be a great pleasure for me, "says Anja. Given that her good friend Alenka Godec cheered on the hit Mamma Mia! and that the Simone Generation is the Aquarius, it's basically a surprise that no one has invited her to the musicals yet. Otherwise, you will be able to sing and dance in Stožice at the biggest 90 / 00s party in this part of Europe, with a bunch of local and international music stars of the time, with Anja, who has performed less frequently than you would like in recent years.
